Digital TicTacToe

One of my earliest projects, TicTacToe was the first project I made that utilised my (then) recently acquired skills of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

An extremely simple project, TicTacToe is nothing but a digital version of the widely popular game of the same name. The inspiration for this project was my school's firewall, which blocked all sorts of games.

Not only did this digital version of TicTacToe help me bypass this obstacle and ward off boredom, it was also a stepping stone for much more complex projects in the near future.

The game can be played against a friend (multiplayer mode) or against a computer (single player mode), and can be found here.
